intro.title: Why Me?
intro.introduction: I am a passionate frontend developer focused on modern web technologies. My expertise lies in developing user-friendly and performant applications using Angular, TypeScript, and modern design systems.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.text: I stay up-to-date with the latest technology and continuously expand my knowledge. Currently, I'm deepening my understanding of React and Vue.js to become even more versatile.

join.about: Join is a comprehensive project management application that helps teams efficiently organize and manage their tasks. With an intuitive user interface and powerful features.
join.workprocess: The project was developed using agile methods, where I focused on frontend development with Angular and Firebase integration. Special emphasis was placed on responsive design and user experience.
join.workexperience: Through this project, I was able to deepen my Angular skills and gain valuable experience in teamwork. The challenge was particularly in implementing complex drag-and-drop functionalities.

pollo.about: El Pollo Loco is an exciting jump-and-run game developed with pure JavaScript. The game offers an entertaining gaming experience with various levels and challenges.
pollo.workprocess: Development was done entirely with Vanilla JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, and CSS. Special attention was paid to game mechanics, animations, and performance optimization.
pollo.workexperience: This project helped me solidify my JavaScript fundamentals and develop a deeper understanding of game development and canvas programming.

dababble.about: DA Bubble is a modern communication platform that enables teams to collaborate effectively. With real-time messaging, channels, and file sharing, it provides all the necessary tools for modern team communication.

player.reference1: Yasin has an impressive ability to solve complex problems and develop innovative solutions. His communication is always clear and professional.
player.reference2: Working with Yasin was excellent. He brings not only technical expertise but also a positive attitude and team spirit.
player.reference3: Yasin shows exceptional attention to detail and has consistently delivered high-quality work on time. A valuable team partner.
